name: @dandeliongold/inspector-electron
author: Dandelion Gold, LLC (original Inspector app by Anthropic, PBC)

scripts.dev: vite build --mode main && vite build --mode preload && electron dist-electron/main.js --enable-logging --trace-warnings
scripts.build: npm run build:electron && npm run build:package
scripts.build:electron: vite build --mode main && vite build --mode preload
